Posts.Content: Oct 16, 2007 09:08AM JTerpen760 wrote: I wonder how much research has been done on Breast removal  from26 years ago..I am now after having a breast removed in 1982 and coming back in the chest wall in 1995 having horrible pain. Had chemo twice and radation once. No pain for all those years. Now I am having the most screaming pain in my arm pit and shoulder blade. Had every test you can imagine...all clear. Now going for theraphy. It did help for a few months but the horrible pain came back last week.  Nothing to do but scream.. Tylenol has helped some. Was told this is from a nerve under scar tissue.
